body:
Must agree with administrators.
What is this bookworm thing some fans have bout translation.
It was crystal clear what happened.
Sex is universal.
Talk is cheap.
And in a series with such a game name like trigger whats there to read about it?
Just enjoy the cuckolds and snu snu.

No matter if Osamu is a nerdy glasses kohai he still the man of the couple and Yuuma should always be the girl.
Way to go ren rojiko doujinkas.
Now I'm gonna wait here till someone translate this
